name: Spashift
description:
A mix of space shooter games and puzzle games, where you need to avoid being destroyed by your enemies at the same time you think whats the best route you can get to get to where you want on the screen.

Many weapons, upgrades and weapon upgrades drops from enemies, but you can only keep one weapon at a time, so be carefull on what you keep!

Can be played alone or with 2 players, by controller, mouse, arrows or WASD controls

This demo only have 2 levels and no sounds unfortunately.
